programmes.show_description: Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss & Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore & The White Stripes.
In order telling the rock story of a decade - over 2 hours of Aerosmith, Bon Jovi, GNR, RHCP, Foo Fighters, ZZ Top, Nirvana, Pearl Jam and The Offspring.
Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss & Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore & The White Stripes.
The biggest rock anthems & power ballads from the legendary Meat Loaf!
In order - 30 years, every song a number 1 rock single or from a classic number 1 rock album.
These are the legendary rock stars that made the 80s! Expect Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler, Queen, Bon Jovi, AC/DC, Iron Maiden & loads more!
Let your hair down as Claire Sturgess has a wild ride of fabulous follicles and awesome rock hairdos! From Bowie's glamorous transformations to Joe Elliot's indestructible mullet.
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
20 epic songs loaded with mega hair energy & power chords! From 80s rock icons Boston, Whitesnake & Chicago to modern day heroes The Darkness, Green Day & My Chemical Romance.
These rebellious teens rocked every college campus throughout the 90s and 00s. Expect great tunes from Blink-182, Wheatus, Good Charlotte and many more!
Starting in 2001, here are the biggest rock songs from Linkin Park!
Mark Goodier with a countdown of bands and artists who've had one rock song that has been viewed over a billion times since the 00s.
Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
Sing-along classics & rock party anthems all night long. Crazy, Crazy, Crazy party nights featuring KISS, Queen, Meatloaf, Kaiser Chiefs and Foo Fighters to name just a few!
All 90s rock hits & power ballads! From Aerosmith, KISS & The Foo Fighters to The Stone Roses, Garbage & The Stereophonics. This is NOW Rock!
From 1995 to 2009 - 30 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Green Day!
Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
Turn up your speakers to 11 and live life even louder! Emo Anthems in order from Linkin Park in 2000 to The My Chemical Romance at the end of the Decade!
A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy & loads more!
Crammed full with extraordinary finds, hidden treasures, and plenty of old relics! From the Stones and Genesis, to Iggy and Aerosmith - how many of these family heirlooms do you own?
Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
Over 4 hours of non-stop the biggest, timeless anthems! Featuring legendary acts like AC/DC, Jimi Hendrix, and Queen, through to Linkin Park, Razorlight and Fall Out Boy.
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
Nicky Horne presents his favourite 30 rock party anthems of all time, featuring Led Zeppelin, Def Leppard, Thin Lizzy and David Bowie.
Your weekend anthems and the biggest rock songs from the last 50 years! From the Beatles and the Stones in the 60s right through to One Republic and Kings Of Leon in the 10s.

programmes.show_name: Turn Up The Alt Rock Anthems!
programmes.show_description: Turn up your spreakers to 11 and live life even louder! 50 alt rock anthems in order, featurng Imagine Dragons, Blink-182, The Killers and The Foo Fighters!
